articles.title: Russia’s central bank to hold extraordinary meeting after rouble falls to 16-month low - The Guardian
articles.description: Bank will discuss interest rate after high spending on war in Ukraine and drop in export revenues put further pressure on Russia’s economy
articles.content:
Russias central bank has announced it will hold an extraordinary meeting on Tuesday to discuss the level of its key interest rate after the rouble fell to its weakest point in almost 17 months.
